100.comment: Used for grouping instances of related inline content, like tags, as if itâ€™s a space between words. (default key line for spacing)

200.comment: Used for grouping related components (e.g. fields in a form) and separating elements within a component (e.g. space between an icon and text label)

300.comment: Used for left/right padding inside components like buttons and form elements

400.comment: Used for creating a relationship between two groups of related content

600.comment: Used for separating sub-sections of content; padding within main page container

800.comment: Used for separating sections of content
